Text: Whoaf whoaf grrrrrrr! I`m hungry. Please bring me some bones. My lord, Pedrito is vege, and I would like eat some meat! Can you bring me some bones?  Whauf!
So that`s the problem, lettuce and tomato salad from Pedrito? Ok. If I find some meal I`ll bring it to you.
Whoaf! Thanks! Crunk crunch (Dogs eats with taste two bones)..
Ok. Now I can back home, but later on I`ll have to hunt some meal. Whoaf!
Event: quest Pedritos Wolf has been completed
